statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe' OR username = 'jane_smith' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles JOIN users ON user_roles.user_id = users.user_id WHERE username = 'jane_smith';

SELECT username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 10 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT users.username, user_roles.role FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;

SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE role_name = 'Admin';

SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;

SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, ar.access_time, ar.action_performed FROM users u JOIN access_logs ar ON u.user_id = ar.user_id WHERE ar.user_id = 3 ORDER BY ar.access_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%';

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin'
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id
